name: City Bus Transport Service
description:
You have derived many heavy vehicles excavator, winch, tractor, train and now enjoy the modern Busman parking 3D Simulator game with realistic bus control and challenging gameplay. Indian city 3d bus parking game has every parking feature which a parking game needs to have. Now you can expand your transportation business with multiple furious and fury busies and pick more passengers. Crazy bus-man parking game give you the opportunity to become real pro bus driver and park multiple buses in bus station, school bus parking plaza and near the beach parking slots. Drive bus 3d in realistic open world 3D environment in this monster bus parking mania. Get behind body and steering wheel of an auto school bus simulator and after drop kids to School Park the bus in multi-story parking track plaza and park at right place.
Park huge passenger bus on streets, river side and airport area on different challenging tracks and experience you’re driving skills in rush hours. Super parking bus simulator has realistic detailed auto system and it requires expert person driving skills to turn around narrow, sharp turns and room parking. Show your parking fury skills and get your driving license from traffic police by showcasing great ability to control big passenger bus. Multi-track coaster Bus Parking offers multiple vehicles to park in realistic environment.
Nowadays there is an enormous trend of play mobile games. People are spending their free time in playing challenge games. There are multiple types of games like action fighting games, car simulation games, adventure war games and sports games. Every game represents different game players’ interest. So we have launched Bus Parking Simulation game according to the interest of our loving users. This game has more different and unique features.
Crazy Driver Bus Parking Features:
• Realistic and challenges parking location with other parked vehicles
• Different buses models American, Chennai, and Elevator
• 208 challenges parking levels
• Day and night parking mode
• Park your bus in limited time period
• Smooth and easy three controls tilt, steering and button
• Place your desire bus number plate feature
• Realistic physics and awesome 3D graphics
• Follow the indicator to go on right side
• Head light and back light on and off button in night mode
• Set game resolution according to your device pixel 506p, 720p, and 1080p
• Set the quality of game Faster, Good and Fantastic
• Change different camera angle in game play by touching camera button
• Game require a lot of precious attention on your part
• Available free and pro on app store
• Realistic bus sound and entertaining background music
